hasDitaContent.@value: Nicotinic acid causes bleeding, as can venlafaxine ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Nicotinic acid   causes   bleeding, as can   venlafaxine   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Nicotinic acid causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet countconsult product literature.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both nicotinic acid and warfarin can increase the risk of bleeding.
